transcript.text: [Music]
Shalom Shalom it's preparation day

till the Sabbath or half-hour I just
wanted to make the video of showing I
know I have it but it'll make a lot of
outside videos lately just because of
the weather and I love the Faust II
misty rain I just want to make another
video just because I thought gosh I
think this is pretty humorous pretty
funny so the the attacks and the false
narratives on me have gotten even more
outlandish
and more cartoonish my media master
webmaster Cathy who maintains a lot of
my alternative websites now the trolls

that that that FBI informants have
informed them that I'm a human
trafficker yep so let's see over the

now I'm a human trafficker I was

oh my media webmaster says that my

there's so many the the the accusations

makes me and and he's not just blessing

if the IRS shows up

why not just take my finger and just
just poke the eye of all the trolls I
have out there hallelujah well I'm never

much I'm not gonna stop defending our

he's attacking and exposing these
